articles.headline: Amazon Web Services Expands Hyperscale Infrastructure in Indiana Heartland
articles.content: Amazon Web Services continues its strategic data center expansion with a new construction project in New Carlisle, Indiana, signaling continued investment in Midwestern digital infrastructure. The facility represents AWS's ongoing commitment to building out regional compute and cloud capacity to support growing enterprise and regional connectivity demands. While specific technical details remain limited, the project underscores the company's persistent growth strategy in deploying large-scale, mission-critical data center assets across the United States.

articles.headline: New Data Center Facility Expands Digital Infrastructure in Metro Atlanta Region
articles.content: A recently operational data center in Fayetteville, Georgia, represents another strategic addition to the Southeast's growing technology ecosystem. The facility strengthens the region's digital infrastructure capabilities, potentially attracting enterprise and cloud computing workloads to the metro Atlanta area. While specific operational details remain limited, the project signals continued investment in Georgia's expanding data center market.
